item.title: 024 - Is It a Poor Craftsman That Blames His Tools
item.description: There is this saying that “It is a poor craftsman that blames his tools.” I think it means that having done a poor job at something, it is a bad excuse to blame the tools you were using to do the job. As it to say you would have been able to do a good job, if it were not for the short comings of these tools which you did not make and so are not accountable for.
